name: Free At Last
description: Play as a robot that escapes from working at a rocket factory and explore your star system. Establish bases, research technology, farm, fish, fight, and so much more.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Intel Core i3 (2.4 GHz) or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 520 with 1GB of RAM or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
